description:
Are you writing great content that is not getting the targeted traffic it deserves? Whether you are a blogger, copywriter, email or internet marketer, if your headline falls flat so will your content. Killer content without a killer headline is worth nothing. Have you seen less talented writers getting tremendous traffic? It's because they drew their target audience in with their headline. If you are ready to learn how to create winning headlines that will get you the traffic, clicks, shares and sales you are looking for, look no further!

In this course you will learn how to create the headlines that will capture the attention of your target audience. We will teach you how to compose headlines with the right keywords and structure that will draw readers just like a magnet. You are going to learn how to search for keywords relevant to your content, how to balance long tail, niche phrases with head term keywords to give you the ratio you need for winning SEO. Next, we will take you back to past marketing gold and show you how to create powerful swipe files for inspiration. You will learn why certain headlines work and when to use them. You will understand that you cannot apply a fill-in-the blank headline template to your content. Instead, you will learn how to create your headline before you start writing your content. Creating that winning headline will make your content soar! So what are you waiting for? Let's get you on your way to more traffic, shares, clicks and revenue!
title: How To Write Winning Headlines That Are Click Magnets
